caption.p: Enzyme activity of caspase 2, 6, 8 and 9 following treatment of different cancer cells with F. alnus and P. harmala leaf extracts (IC 50). The results showed that increased caspase activity occurred after F. alnus and P. harmala treatment in all cancer cell lines compared to the control cells. The activity was expressed as a percentage (%) of control. The values are means ± SDs of three series of experiments. Different letters among columns indicate significant differences at p ≤ 0.05.
